variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-argcomplete
dependencies.description: Bash tab completion for argparse.

dependencies.name: py-bagit
dependencies.description:
bagit is a Python library and command line utility for working with
BagIt style packages.

dependencies.name: py-coloredlogs
dependencies.description: Colored terminal output for Python's logging module

dependencies.name: py-cwl-utils
dependencies.description:
Python Utilities and Autogenerated Classes for loading and parsing CWL
v1.0, CWL v1.1, and CWL v1.2 documents.

dependencies.name: py-mypy-extensions
dependencies.description:
Experimental type system extensions for programs checked with the mypy
typechecker.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-prov
dependencies.description:
A Python library for W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV). A library for W3C
Provenance Data Model supporting PROV-JSON, PROV-XML and PROV-O (RDF)

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pydot
dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language

dependencies.name: py-pyparsing
dependencies.description: A Python Parsing Module.

dependencies.name: py-rdflib
dependencies.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-schema-salad
dependencies.description: Schema Annotations for Linked Avro Data (SALAD)

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-shellescape
dependencies.description: Shell escape a string to safely use it as a token in a shell command

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
